home.name: Home
home.welcome: Welcome to interim reporting.  Get the most out of the portal:

search.title: Student Search
search.placeholder: Search by student ssid or name

performance_levels.name: Level 3
performance_levels.description: The student has met the achievement standard and demonstrates progress toward mastery of the knowledge and skills in English language arts/literacy needed for likely success in future coursework.

types.name: Concepts & Procedures
types.description: Students can explain and apply mathematical concepts and carry out mathematical procedures with precision and fluency.

types.name: Problem Solving and Modeling & Data Analysis
types.description: Students can solve a range of complex, well-posed problems in pure and applied mathematics, making productive use of knowledge and problem-solving strategies. Students can analyze complex, real-world scenarios and can construct and use mathematical models to interpret and solve problems.

types.name: Communicating Reasoning
types.description: Students can clearly and precisely construct viable arguments to support their own reasoning and to critique the reasoning of others.

types.name: Reading
types.description: Students can read closely and analytically to comprehend a range of increasingly complex literary and informational texts.

types.name: Writing
types.description: Students can produce effective and well-grounded writing for a range of purposes and audiences.

types.name: Listening
types.description: Students can employ effective speaking and listening skills for a range of purposes and audiences.

types.name: Research & Inquiry
types.description: Students can engage in research and inquiry to investigate topics and to analyze, integrate, and present information.

labels.psychometric_implications: Achievement Levels illustrate how students scored on the assessment and student's strengths and areas of improvement. Test results are one of many measures of a student's academic achievement.

accommodations.heading: Accommodations
accommodations.section: The following accommodations were made available:

labels.invalid_test_text: The scores in this assessment should be used with caution as the tests were administered under conditions that resulted in a score that may not be an accurate representation of the student's achievement.
labels.partial_test_text: The student did not answer all of the questions on this test and all unanswered questions have been reported as incorrect.
labels.standard_test_text: This score was derived from an assessment that was administered in a standardized manner. It is appropriate to compare this score with other scores administered in the same standardized manner.
